title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\TagField
name: TagField
description:
Contains the value and additional information on a field within a [Tag][google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.Tag].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.TagField

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Output only. The display name of this field.

params.name: data.double_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with a double type.

params.name: data.string_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with a string type. The maximum length is 2000 UTF-8 characters.

params.name: data.bool_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with a boolean type.

params.name: data.timestamp_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with a timestamp type.

params.name: data.enum_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with an enum type. This value must be one of the allowed values listed in this enum.

params.name: data.richtext_value
params.description: The value of a tag field with a rich text type. The maximum length is 10 MiB as this value holds HTML descriptions including encoded images. The maximum length of the text without images is 100 KiB.

params.name: data.order
params.description: Output only. The order of this field with respect to other fields in this tag. Can be set by [Tag][google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.TagTemplateField.order]. For example, a higher value can indicate a more important field. The value can be negative. Multiple fields can have the same order, and field orders within a tag don't have to be sequential.

methods.name: getOrder
methods.description:
Output only. The order of this field with respect to other fields in this tag. Can be set by [Tag][google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.TagTemplateField.order].

For example, a higher value can indicate a more important field. The value can be negative. Multiple fields can have the same order, and field orders within a tag don't have to be sequential.

Generated from protobuf field int32 order = 7 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OUTPUT_ONLY];
